dcterms:creator: A. Rosinol
A. Gupta
M. Abate
J. Shi
L. Carlone
dcterms:description: A 3D Dynamic Scene Graph (DSG) represents the environment as a graph, where nodes correspond to spatial concepts (e.g., objects, places) and edges represent relations among concepts. The model is hierarchical, capturing multiple levels of abstraction useful for navigation.
dcterms:title: 3D Dynamic Scene Graph (DSG)

dcterms:description: Visual Genome connects language and vision using crowdsourced dense image annotations, providing a rich dataset for understanding visual content in relation to language.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome

dcterms:creator: J. Behley

J. Gall
dcterms:description: SemanticKITTI is a dataset for semantic scene understanding of LiDAR sequences, providing labeled data for various semantic classes in 3D environments.
dcterms:title: SemanticKITTI

dcterms:creator: A. Rosinol
M. Abate
Y. Chang
L. Carlone
dcterms:description: Kimera is an open-source library for real-time metric-semantic localization and mapping, providing tools for building and utilizing semantic maps.
dcterms:title: Kimera

dcterms:creator: I. Armeni
Z.-Y. He

S. Savarese
dcterms:description: 3D Scene Graph is a structure for unified semantics, 3D space, and camera, capturing relationships among spatial entities in a hierarchical manner.
dcterms:title: 3D Scene Graph
